Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer.`` Just get your swagger back,'' Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what Elgin Baylor did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night
